about_the_game:
Brainwasher™ isn’t just a game—it’s an experience. A calm, pressure-free world where the only challenge is embracing stillness. No enemies. No timers. No stress. Just the gentle task of restoring harmony, one step at a time.

Pilot your Mindsweeper through evolving landscapes, clearing the clutter and unveiling serenity. As you progress, soothing soundscapes, subtle guidance, and mindful breaks rewire your focus—one deep breath at a time.

Featuring retro-futuristic aesthetics, immersive environments, and a simple but profound journey, Brainwasher™ is your invitation to unplug, unwind, and rediscover clarity.

✨ No ads. No distractions. Just peace. ✨

Take a deep breath. The journey begins now.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or higher display recommended

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or higher display recommended

short_description: Brainwasher™ is a relaxing, exploration-based sim where you pilot a Mindsweeper to clear clutter, restore balance, and expand. With procedurally generated landscapes, soothing soundscapes, and mindful breaks, the only challenge is embracing stillness. No enemies, no stress—just peace.
